personal_info.name: Phạm Hải Nam
personal_info.summary: As a passionate Full Stack Developer, I'm committed to building scalable, maintainable web applications using modern technologies. I specialize in creating robust backend systems with Node.js/NestJS and intuitive frontend experiences with React/Next.js.

projects.title: Gomi Tokyo – Digital waste management contract platform
projects.description: SaaS solutions help businesses automate and simplify the process of signing complex contracts with industrial waste collectors. Convert all cumbersome paperwork to a fast and legally compliant online process

projects.title: Kimono Rental Aki – Kimono Rental Platform
projects.description: E-commerce website and service booking for a large chain of Kimono stores in Tokyo and Yokohama. Optimized customer experience with a catalog of over 5,000 products, multi-language support (Japanese, English, Chinese) to serve both domestic customers and international tourists

projects.title: Smart AI Translate Website
projects.description: TranslateAI is an advanced translation app built with Next.js that leverages Gemini API for high-quality, context-aware language translations.

projects.title: Interior Online Store Website
projects.description: An e-commerce website selling luxury furniture. The system is built using Nestjs combining Prisma for API and React and Nestjs for user interface and admin interface.

projects.title: Games Market Website System
projects.description: A website system that allows conguration and management of many websites selling popular game accounts, allowing users to buy game accounts easily.

projects.title: Tatoo Mobile App
projects.description: A mobile app connects tattoo artists and their potential customers through posting their tattoo photos. Tattoo artists and customers can conveniently chat and book appointments.

honors_and_awards.title: The TOP 10 TEAM at UNIHACK 2023
honors_and_awards.description: Reached the top 10 final teams at the Unihack2023 organized by Google Developer Group

honors_and_awards.title: OVERSEAS TECHNICAL EDUCATION PROGRAM 2023
honors_and_awards.description: Complete the Python programming course with Korean volunteers organized by KOREATECH

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Responsible for contributing to various projects, collaborating closely with designers, developers, and project managers to deliver high-quality applications.
Developed and maintained web applications with Laravel and MySQL, building RESTful APIs for web and mobile clients
Optimized SQL queries and database schema, reducing execution time from ~60s to under 1s through indexing and query refactoring.
Collaborated with team members daily to ensure seamless integration and project success.

experience.title: Backend Developer
description: Responsible for developing and maintaining backend systems, working closely with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable and efcient solutions.
Built and optimized backend services using NestJS, TypeScript and PostgreSQL.
Collaborated on system analysis and development, contributing to the design of effective architectures
Worked with front-end developers to ensure seamless data ow and user experience.
Assisted in debugging and resolving technical issues, improving system performance and reliability.
